snippet.title: Life is Strange 2 E3 2019 Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
Life is Strange 2 E3 2019 Gameplay Trailer

E3 2019 is here so get ready for a whole host of brand new video game content. For the latest gameplay, trailers and news from the LA mega convention check out the playlists below.

E3 2019 Gameplay and Trailers:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=7J2G_oaeBHc&list=PL88Bl_FYi8VwBvGvQwPIxrlYSZ1KBh83Z

Subscribe to our channel for more of the best gameplay videos of your favorite games.

Twitter @ForTheReplay

For Guides and Walkthroughs check out @ClickToUnlock our sister channel at https://www.youtube.com/user/EscherMedia
